about_the_game:
Thanks to all the Kryptonians for their support and anticipation of Chinese Online Games, the new DLC “Lottery Mode” has been officially launched

.
The new DLC “Lottery Mode” has been officially launched[/h2] in response to the voices of the “Kryptonians” in the community who said they liked scratching lottery tickets and wanted to play scratching lottery, and now it's here!

We have made “Scratchers” a new independent mode, adding more than 10 new scratchers of different denominations and different ways of playing, and incorporating a light gameplay with the boss's “cooperation program”. The next “million jackpot” will not be you?




A summary of what's new in the “Lottery Mode” DLC is as follows:

I. A brand new standalone new mode

.You can enter the new mode by selecting “Lottery Mode” on the right side of the main game page.

Second, a new independent leaderboard system

We've added a brand new leaderboard system for the new Lottery Mode, and we wish you all the best of luck!

Third, add a total of 10 new lottery types

Total new brand-new lottery new games:
1, 5 yuan - Slam Dunk Scratchers
2、5RMB - Joyful 3 Eights
3, 10 yuan - sapphire
4、10RMB--Super Luck
5、20RMB--Make a fortune
6、20 yuan - secret treasure hunt
7, 30 yuan - wealth rolls in
8、300--Golden Rooster
9、50RMB - Big Golden Dragon

IV. New animation for Lottery Mode

.

Finally, thank you very much for waiting, DLC launch does not mean that the game stops updating, we will continue to optimize the problem, and seriously listen to the feedback of players to update new content.

name: 中国式网游 - 彩票模式
short_description: More than 10 new Scratchers with different denominations and different games have been added for you to play, and a light game of “cooperation program” with the boss has been incorporated. Will you be the next “Million Dollar Jackpot”?
